column1:
Today in what was billed as a major closing argument speech Trumps major new policy was to promise political and legal retribution against the women who have accused him of groping them, 0, 32
Like Trumps campaign this speech gave us a troubling view as to what a Trump State of the Union would sound likeâ€”rambling unfocused full of conspiracy theories and attacks on the media and lacking in any real answers for American families.
